amendment.description: Amendment hat sought to strike section 743 that prohibits funding to implement country of origin labeling for meat or meat products.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike section 743 of the bill which prohibits use of funds for the implementation of Country of Origin Labeling for meat or meat products.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rehberg amendment Failed by recorded vote: 193 - 208 (Roll no. 354).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Rehberg.
